name: Slime Mailman
description:
Use WASD to move the Slime.

Use the Arrow Keys to spin the Slime around.

Try to get all the packages into the Mailbox without impaling them to win.

All 5 levels are completely possible, but they get a little tricky.

Happy delivery!

*Made for Jame Gam #11 in 3 Days*

*All assets, including music and art, were created by MonologicX in 3 Days*
